question: Which works have been composed by Mozart ?
Which works have been composed in 1836 ?
Which works have been written for string quartet?
What works are linked to a particular work and what type of link connect them?
Retrieve all the works that have been written by German composers between 1800 and 1850 and performed at the Royal Albert Hall
Give me the works written for oboe and orchestra after the 1900
Give me the works written for violin, clarinet and piano (strictly)
Give me the works of chamber music that involves at least violin, clarinet and piano
Give me the works of chamber music that involves at most violin, clarinet and piano
Give me the works of chamber music that involves at most violin, clarinet and piano, except from the sonatas for violin and piano and clarinet and piano
Give me all the melodies for average voice between 1870 and 1913.
Give me all the slow movements of chamber music that foresee at least one cello
Give me all the sacred vocal music for choir written in England since 1945
Give me all the operas of which the composer is also the librettist
Give me a list of melodies of 20th century
Give me a list of works of chamber music composed in the 19th century by Norwegian composers
Give me the list of the works of which at least one of the dedicatees is also a performer of the work
Give me the list of all symphonies that include 5 movements
Give me the list of works composed by Mozart in the last 5 years of his life
Give me a cycle of melodies whose author of text is the same for each melody
Give me a list of works composed between 1860 and 1880, for small formation (maximum 6 instrumentalists) including 1 piano
Give me the list of works of J.S. Bach between BWV 30 and BWV 70
Give me all the works for piano connected to other musical works
Give me all works for piano based on works of Schubert
Give me all the works related to popular music
Give me the name and the birth date of artists that played the oboe
Give me all the performances in which a composer interprets his or her works
Give me all the performances in which a composer directs one of his works
Give me the list of concerts given at the Philharmonie de Paris in which the orchestra is directed by the solo violin
Give me the list of concerts performed at the Abbaye aux Dames de Saintes outside the festival period of Saintes
Give me all the works interpreted on at least one mop different from the casting of the work
Give me the artists that have been recorded more than 10 times by Radio France
Give me the name of the vocal soloist most recorded by Radio France in 2014
Give me the list of all the concerts recorded by Radio France at the Cité de la Musique between 1995 and 2014
Give me the cutting of all the recordings of Don Giovanni by Mozart
Give me all the recordings of the _Catalogue Aria_ (isolated air or in a recording of the opera)
Give me pairs of recorded tracks that are composed with the same key
query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?work1 SAMPLE(?title1) as ?title1 ?work2 SAMPLE(?title2) as ?title2 ?key
WHERE {
  ?trackset efrbroo:R5_has_component ?t1, ?t2 .

  ?t1 mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work1.
  ?t2 mus:U51_is_partial_or_full_recording_of / mus:U54_is_performed_expression_of ?work2.

  ?work1 rdfs:label ?title1 ; mus:U11_has_key ?key .
  ?work2 rdfs:label ?title2 ; mus:U11_has_key ?key .

  FILTER (?work1 != ?work2)
} LIMIT 100

question: Give me all the recordings of opera aria whose library has no score

Show me the Operas composed by Giuseppe Verdi.
How many works did Claude Debussy compose?
List works that require exactly 4 instruments (Quartets).
Find works with 'Moonlight' in the title.
Which works were composed between 1800 and 1810?
Which works have a dedication statement?
Who is 'Maria Callas'?
List musicians born in Vienna.
Which artists are known for playing the Violin?
List composers who died after the year 2000.
How many Italian artists are in the database?
List artists who have acted as conductors.
Find artists with 'Von' in their name.
What performances took place in Paris?
Show all performances from the year 2010.
How many performances are recorded in London?
When was the premiere of 'The Rite of Spring'?
Find performances that have a subtitle or comment.
List performances that happened after 2020.
How many recordings exist for 'Boléro' by Ravel?
What are the most common musical keys in the database?
query:
SELECT ?keyLabel (COUNT(?work) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  ?work mus:U11_has_key ?key .
  ?key skos:prefLabel ?keyLabel .
}
GROUP BY ?keyLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 10
